    @allure.description("To verify that one is able to add item to bag")
    def test_02_Add_product_to_bag(self):
        By_xpath = self.driver.find_element_by_xpath
        try:
            f = open("data.json", "r")
            data = json.loads(f.read())
            time.sleep(5)
            for m in data["menulist_pizza"]:
                print(m)
                execute_click_by_product(self.driver, m)
                select_product(self.driver, m["menuitem"])
                select_pizza_sides(
                    self.driver, m["size"], m["crust1"], m["additional_topping"])
                add_to_bag_and_verify_cart_details(self.driver)
                # time.sleep(5)
            f.close()
        except Exception as e:
            allure.attach(self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(
            ), name='exception_screen', attachment_type=AttachmentType.PNG)

    @allure.step("to add product to bag and verify cart details before checkout")
    def add_to_bag_and_verify_cart_details(driver):
        By_xpath = driver.find_element_by_xpath
        try:
            try:
                item_price1 = By_xpath(productlocators.add_tobag_btn_price).text
                print(item_price1)
                By_xpath(productlocators.add_to_bag).click()
            except:
                item_price1 = By_xpath(productlocators.edit_tobag_btn_price).text
                print(item_price1)
                By_xpath(productlocators.edit_update_btn).click()
    
            By_xpath(cartLocators.cart_bag).click()
    
            items_price2 = By_xpath(cartLocators.product_price).text
            items_price3 = items_price2[1:]
            print(items_price3)
            assert items_price3 == item_price1
    
            subtotal = By_xpath(cartLocators.cart_subtotal).text
            subtotal2 = subtotal[1:]
            assert subtotal == items_price2
    
            tax = By_xpath(cartLocators.estimated_tax).text
            time.sleep(1)
            tax2 = tax[1:]
    
            totalprice = float(subtotal2) + float(tax2)
            print(totalprice)
            format_float = "{:.2f}".format(totalprice)
            # y= float(get_item_prize[1:])
            # format_float="{:.2f}".format(y)
            print("total price")
    
            total = By_xpath(cartLocators.total).text
            time.sleep(1)
            total2 = total[1:]
            total3 = float(total2)
            format_float2 = "{:.2f}".format(total3)
            print(total3)
>           assert format_float2 == format_float
